string.text:
An improved modification of the PKM machine gun in a body kit from the Zenitka company. The model has angled foregrip installed for better recoil control. In the Zone it is used mainly by the military (special forces).
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All scopes for picatinny/weaver, Zenit Perst-3 tactical device with red laser (included)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: KZRZP suppressor

A lighter and improved modification of the PKM machine gun in a body kit from the Zenitka company. Thanks to the short barrel, the model has improved ergonomics, which makes it more suitable for fighting in urban areas. The model has angled foregrip installed for better recoil control. In the Zone it is used mainly by the military (special forces).
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All scopes for picatinny/weaver, Zenit Perst-3 tactical device with red laser (included)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: KZRZP suppressor

A lighter and improved modification of the PKP machine gun. Thanks to the short barrel, the model has improved ergonomics, which makes it more suitable for fighting in urban areas. The model has angled foregrip installed for better recoil control. In the Zone it is used mainly by the military (special forces) and Mercenaries.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All scopes for picatinny/weaver, Zenit Perst-3 tactical device with red laser (included)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: KZRZP suppressor
